entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the center of attention, with people surrounding him and trying to touch him. The text states that 'all of them were determined to touch the Boy Who Lived', indicating Harry's importance in this scene.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as one of the first people to reach Harry and wrap his arms around him. The text states 'the ﬁrst to reach him were Ron and Hermione', indicating Ron's close relationship with Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as one of the first people to reach Harry and wrap her arms around him. The text states 'the ﬁrst to reach him were Ron and Hermione', indicating Hermione's close relationship with Harry.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as one of the people who reaches Harry after Ron and Hermione. The text states 'Then Ginny, Neville, and Luna were there', indicating Ginny's presence in this scene.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as one of the people who reaches Harry after Ron and Hermione. The text states 'Then Ginny, Neville, and Luna were there', indicating Neville's presence in this scene.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as one of the people who reaches Harry after Ron and Hermione. The text states 'Then Ginny, Neville, and Luna were there', indicating Luna's presence in this scene.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as one of the people who reaches Harry. The text states 'and Hagrid, and Kingsley and McGonagall and Flitwick and Spout', indicating Hagrid's presence in this scene.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are described as a group of people who reach Harry. The text states 'and all the Weasleys', indicating their collective presence in this scene.
